title: Poster, "HorseMoveProjectSpace Presents: Frank Ammerlaan and Michael Agacki", 2008
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
description:
Typographic forms emerge through an overall pattern of black and white. Effect is of three dimensional embossing.
HorseMove ProjectSpace Presents Frank Ammerlaan and Michael Agacki Opening on Sunday the 3th of February.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "HorseMoveProjectSpace Presents: Frank Ammerlaan and Michael Agacki", 2008.
2008. Offset lithograph on white wove paper. Gift of Michiel Schuurman. 2008-22-4.
